column4: # map vendors to their 1 or 3 byte MMA ID
trade name: ie. Roger Linn Design
shorthand for other tables: ie. rld
1 or 3 byte identifier assigned by MIDI Manufacturer’s Association: ie [00 01 37]
# map devices to vendor, IDRQ response codes, protocol table, dump memory maps, etc
device trade name: ie. Adrenalinn III
four byte device code from F0 7E 7F 06 01 message: ie [01 00 03 00]
byte string which must appear in protocol strings to identify the device
name of ProtoTable holding the strings for communicating with the device
name of MemoryMap description for the device
enumeration of types for the device: ie: effect;drumseq
our name for this operation: ie BULK_RQ
identifier for how the data is to decoded/encoded in SERP;MIDI7;NYBNYB;MIDI8;HBB_MSB0;HBB_LSB8

column5: serpentine encoding as used by Alesis Quadra
native format is all 7 bit bytes, memory map describes adequately
bytes sent in 0000bbbb 0000bbbb pairs like recent Dave Smith stuff
bytes sent in 0000000b 0bbbbbbb pairs like Digitech HISC
7 - to -8 byte packing where MS bits are in the first byte, bit 8 or byte 7 in MSB.  Dave Smith for bulk transfers
7 - to -8 byte packing where MS bits are in the last byte, bit 8 or byte 7 in LSB.  Behringer.

column4: ;-separated tokens that will appear in the protocol string
